sentences.en: After all , he said to himself , it & apos ; s probably only insomnia.
sentences.cn: 到头来, 他对自己说,大概又只是失眠.

sentences.en: Bromine can restrain central nervous system and avoid insomnia.
sentences.cn: 溴:抑制中枢神经,有镇静作用,能防治失眠.

sentences.en: During this period, the patient experiences tremulousness , anxiety, depression. and insomnia.
sentences.cn: 在这一期间, 患者经受颤抖 、 忧虑 、 郁闷和失眠的痛苦.

sentences.en: He has been troubled with insomnia [ by a bad tooth ].
He has been troubled with insomnia.
However, for one in six people insomnia is a continual problem.
sentences.cn: 不过在每6个人中便有一人患有持续性失眠症.

sentences.en: I have great friends whom I love but never want to hang out with because insomnia has stolen my desire to be social.
sentences.cn: 我有很多我喜爱的朋友，但是我再也不想和他们去逛街，因为失眠症使我失去了社交的欲望。

sentences.en: I know someone with insomnia who only gets two hours of sleep each night.
sentences.cn: 我认识一个患有失眠症的人，他每天晚上只能睡上两个小时。

sentences.en: If you experience insomnia ( inability to fall asleep ), see a sleep specialist.
sentences.cn: 如果你有失眠问题 ( 难以入睡 ), 还应找个睡眠专家.

sentences.en: If you have insomnia, try my simple cure.
sentences.cn: 如果你有失眠症，试试我的简单疗法。

sentences.en: In my insomnia, you have to hold me to sleep.
sentences.cn: 在我失眠的时候，你要抱着我睡。

sentences.en: Psychic changes have been commonly observed, as well as daytime somnolence, nocturnal insomnia, and partial blindness.
sentences.cn: 普遍观察的有精神变化, 以及白天嗜睡, 夜间失眠和部分失明.

sentences.en: Psychologist Richard Allen, co - director of the Johns Hopkins Center, considers insomnia a 24 - hour disorder.
sentences.cn: 心理学家理查德-艾伦是约翰 - 霍布金斯失眠治疗中心的联席主任, 他认为失眠症属于24小时神经失调症.

sentences.en: Tree Peony mainly used as a nerve tonic for insomnia and depression.
sentences.cn: 牡丹被用于调理神经,改善失眠及抑郁.

sentences.en: Try these pills. They will cure your insomnia.
sentences.cn: 试试这些药片. 它们会治好你的失眠症.

sentences.en: What Happens When Insomnia Disrupts Your Night - and Your Dreams?
sentences.cn: 失眠入侵你的睡梦时发生了什么?

sentences.en: Worries and tenseness can lead to insomnia.
sentences.cn: 忧虑和紧张会导致失眠.

trans.tran_en: if you suffer from insomnia, you are not able to sleep
